---
name: "Implement Authentication System"
about: "Implement a robust authentication system for the application."
title: "[Feature] Robust Authentication System"
labels: enhancement
description: >
  Implement a robust authentication system that caters to both parents and children. This feature will include registering, logging in, and necessary security protocols.
  
# Details
- Create separate roles and permissions for parents and children.
- Ensure password policies and two-factor authentication.
- Include account recovery options.

# Acceptance Criteria
- Tailored authentication process for each user role.
- Secure and reliable login process.
- Complete test coverage of major use cases.
